room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Great Lakes Escape Game in Flint
review: Fun and interesting game. We did The Heist and it was a real challenge (in a good way!). We did escape, however! Definitely want to try the other rooms in the near future!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Great Lakes Escape Game in Flint
review: Me and my husband played The Heist and we had a blast! I cannot wait to go back. The staff was so nice and very helpful. I highly recommend playing. We are already thinking of people to bring with us to solve the rooms. Thank you to the staff for a really fun time!
